jcr:content.browserTitle: Adobe Digital Publishing Solution features | Buy Adobe Digital Publishing Solution
jcr:content.metaDescription: Learn more about Adobe Digital Publishing Solution capabilities that help improve interactivity, customization, mobile publishing and analysis.

text.text:
It pays to be beautiful.

Create stunning mobile apps with business impact.

promo.productIntroText: Find out how Adobe Experience Manager can help your business.

free.productIntroText: Find out how Adobe Experience Manager can help your business.

paid.productIntroText: Find out how Adobe Experience Manager can help your business.

mmarquee.text:
It pays to be beautiful.

Create stunning mobile apps with business impact.

text_f732.text: Everything you need for apps. And then some.

text_d649.text: Adobe Digital Publishing Solution features all you need to create, distribute, monetize and optimize engaging app experiences.

text_300c.text: Create content-rich experiences audiences enjoy on every device.

text_e608.text: Create high-impact content.

text_74c2.text: Set your ideas in motion with engaging slide shows, audio, video, scrolling, 360-degree rotation, pan and zoom, hyperlinks \u0003and HTML5 animation.

text_76a4.text: Take control and customize.

text_3905.text: You now have finer control of app layouts and can create completely customized and intuitive brand experiences for all your audiences.

text_fec9.text: Be seen and be heard.

text_c67a.text: Connect with audiences through relevant content, push notifications, in-app messages, easy content discovery \u0003and social sharing.

text_6a97.text: Features so flexible, they stretch limits.

text_2459.text: Use familiar tools to achieve extraordinary results.

text_4258.text: Build it yourself. No coding needed.

text_f02f.text: Use the tools you know and love in \u0003Adobe Creative Cloud to create a pixel-perfect app experience or HTML files for responsive layouts — all without the help of developers.

text_e8d4.text: Keep it fresh and relevant.

text_aa08.text: Easily manage content from Adobe Experience Manager to deliver new content as often as you like and keep customers coming back for more.

text_5bc6.text: Work and play well with others.

text_c632.text: Use HTML design tools or content management systems like Drupal and WordPress \u0003to make your content delivery \u0003seamless and simple.

text_117f.text: Prove your mobile strategy is on the money.

text_4cfb.text: Know exactly how your app is performing and your audience is engaging, thanks to deep integration with Adobe Marketing Cloud.

text_7866.text: Learn from readers’ behavior, whether they are \u0003online or offline. Retention analyses, marketing funnel conversion rates and tracking of app traffic are all at your fingertips.

text_2493.text: Built-in analytics automatically show what’s working \u0003and what’s not, so you can refine content and get insight into ROI.

text_8ac6.text: Offer selling options for every business model, such as allowing for the purchase of products or premium content in your app.

text_3c2f.text: Beauty, brains and business muscle.

text_ef49.text: A built-for-business platform, backed by Adobe.

text_35c7.text: Create and manage apps for internal and external audiences. Publish them privately or publicly. And easily make changes without resubmitting to app stores.

text_fec8.text: Allow team members and agencies to contribute content. Then easily search and sort, so you can control how and when it’s published.

text_4c25.text: Rest easy knowing Digital Publishing Solution integrates seamlessly with authentication systems to target content to audiences.

contactpod.description: Find out how DPS can help you achieve your business goals.
contactpod.title: Want to know more?
